samples.commui
Class BuddyView

java.lang.Object
  samples.ui.View
      samples.commui.CommunityView
          samples.commui.BuddyView
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener
public class BuddyView
extends CommunityView
implements EventListener

This class implements all Buddy related UI components and layouts. It lists buddies, their presence states and pop-up for 'chat', 'challenge' or 'remove' buddies.

BuddyView

public BuddyView(Community community,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 BuddyList buddyList)
BuddyView creates BuddyList and reperesnts in a Table format.All the UI layout for buddylist view is done here.

Parameters:
community - Main Community object
name - Name of this View
buddyList - Buddy List
